newsitem.title: EGYPT: Brothers save wife from Egypt sea then drown.
newsitem.headline: Brothers save wife from Egypt sea then drown.

text.p: Two brothers drowned off Egypt's Mediterranean coast after saving the younger man's wife from the stormy sea, the government daily al-Gomhuria said on Wednesday.
It said Sayed Gorani, 35, and his brother Ahmed, 40, had rushed into the sea to rescue Sayed's wife.
They succeeded in pushing her towards the shore but were themselves engulfed by the waves, the newspaper added.
